pr_title: Include step labels in optimized queries

timeline.bodyText: Looks good. Do you want to move this to JanusGraphAssert?

replies.bodyText: I did this quick and dirty because I have an ongoing PR (#2202) to reorganize optimization strategies and the according tests. I will simply refactor the tests for this Fix together with (#2202).
